remarks:
Version of ~ 19.41 with three quantifiers and a dv condition requiring fewer axioms.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Apr-1995.) 

---

 Theorem 19.41 of [Margaris] p. 90 with 3 quantifiers.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Apr-1995.)
statement:
19.41vvv $p |- ( E. x E. y E. z ( ph /\ ps ) <-> ( E. x E. y E. z ph /\ ps ) ) $.
$d ps x $.
$d ps y $.
$d ps z $.
